ComicInfo.Title: Dolly Gets the Universal Bughood Blues; Gravy on Gay
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-10 19:47:13. [CVDB329162] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:15:21. [Issue ID 264235]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Barefootz thinks he is another person.
Dolly can't stand the cockroaches.
Glory sunbathes while Barefootz is trying to sleep.
Headrack comments on gay issues with his painting.
Fizzo is tripping on the drug LSD.
The cockroaches re-decorate Barefootz refrigerator while he is on the phone with Dolly.
Glory plays dead.
Headrack realizes that having a cult following is better than no following at all.
One of cockroaches hits puberty.
The Jello is a little on the tough side.
Barefootz pet under the bed does Christmassy frogs.
Headrack says God wants Barefootz to get in touch with Him.
Dolly disintegrates Barefootz ego.
Dolly is hungry.
